summary.span: 為所有內嵌動態內容項目提供基底的抽象類別。

span.span: An abstract class that provides a base for all inline flow content elements.

summary.span: 由衍生類別呼叫時，初始化基底類別值。

span.span: Initializes base class values when called by a derived class.

summary.span: 取得或設定用於 項目的基準線對齊。

span.span: Gets or sets the baseline alignment for the element.

value.span: 列舉型別的成員，用來指定 項目的基準線對齊。

span.span: A member or the enumeration specifying the baseline alignment for the element.
The default value is .**Baseline**.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::FlowDirection FlowDirection { System::Windows::FlowDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::FlowDirection value); };
member this.FlowDirection : System.Windows.FlowDirection with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定 項目中內容的相對流向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

value.span: 列舉型別的成員，用來指定相對流向。

span.span: A member of the enumeration specifying the relative flow direction.

value.span: 取得這個屬性會傳回目前有效的流向。

span.span: Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction.

value.span: 設定此屬性會導致 項目的內容依指示的方向重新流動。

span.span: Setting this property causes the contents of the element to re-flow in the indicated direction.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字方向的內容通常會對應到所表示之語言的固有流向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯來文和阿拉伯文提供自然流程從右至左的語言的範例。Hebrew and Arabic provide examples of languages that naturally flow from right-to-left. 英文、 德文和俄文提供自然流程從左到右的語言的範例。English, German, and Russian provide examples of languages that naturally flow from left-to-right. > [!NOTE] 這個屬性的值不會自動變更為符合作業系統所使用的語言。The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. 如果您需要使用不同的值，則預設值是，您必須指定它自己。If you need to use a different value then the default of , you must specify it yourself. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、 , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_Inline_FlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_inline_flowdirectionxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_flowdirection)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_flowdirection)]

summary.span: 取得下一個此項目之對等的 項目。

span.span: Gets the next element that is a peer to this element.

value.span: 物件，表示下一步這個項目之對等的項目或**null**如果沒有下一個項目。

span.span: An object representing the next element that is a peer to this element, or **null** if there is no next element.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. summary.span: 取得上一個此項目之對等的 項目。

span.span: Gets the previous element that is a peer to this element.

value.span: 物件，代表先前這個項目之對等的項目或**null**如果沒有先前項目。

span.span: An object representing the previous element that is a peer to this element, or **null** if there is no previous element.
This property has no default value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SiblingInlines As InlineCollection

summary.span: 取得 ，其中包含的 項目是此項目的同層級 (對等)。

span.span: Gets an that contains the elements that are siblings (peers) to this element.

value.span: 物件，其中包含的 項目是此項目的同層級。

span.span: An object that contains the elements that are siblings to this element.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性一律傳回的集合包含所要求集合的項目。The collection returned by this property always contains the element through which the collection is requested. 也就是內嵌項目被視為自己的同層級，供建置的同層級項目的集合。That is, an inline element is considered to be its own sibling for the purpose of building a collection of siblings for the element. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_SiblingBase](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_siblingbase)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_SiblingBase](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_siblingbase)] [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_Siblings](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_siblings)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_Siblings](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_siblings)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ TextDecorations { System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ value); };
member this.TextDecorations : System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection with get, set

summary.span: 取得 ，包含要套用至這個項目的文字裝飾。

span.span: Gets a that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

value.span: 集合，包含要套用至這個項目的文字裝飾。

span.span: A collection that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

value.span: 預設值是**null** （不套用文字裝飾）。

span.span: The default value is **null** (no text decorations applied).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件是您可以新增至文字的視覺裝飾。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 有四種類型的文字裝飾： 底線、 基準、 刪除線和頂線。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 如需文字裝飾的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 建立文字裝飾](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的屬性項目 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDecXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_inline_textdecxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設刪除線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設刪除線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect") 下圖顯示如何**頂線**，**基準**，並**底線**分別裝飾呈現。The following figures show how the **Overline**, **Baseline**, and **Underline** decorations render, respectively. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 頂線 TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 頂線 TextDecorator")![Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator") ![螢幕擷取畫面： 預設基準線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 預設基準線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text") ![螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設底線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設底線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default underline effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "Screenshot: Text with default underline effect") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_textdec)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_textdec)]
